coyote/

printpath.pro


top source PrintPath

PrintPath, filename

NAME: PrintPath

PURPOSE:

This is a utility program for printing the IDL path in a simplied format for easy browsing.

AUTHOR: FANNING SOFTWARE CONSULTING David Fanning, Ph.D. 1645 Sheely Drive Fort Collins, CO 80526 USA Phone: 970-221-0438 E-mail: david@idlcoyote.com Coyote's Guide to IDL Programming: http://www.idlcoyote.com

CATEGORY:

Utilites

CALLING SEQUENCE:

IDL> PrintPath

INPUTS:

filename: The name of the output file. If not present, the output is written into the command log window.

KEYWORDS:

None.

MODIFICATION HISTORY:

Written by David W. Fanning, 8 Nov 2007. Added FILENAME parameter, 9 July 2012. DWF.
